abstract: Toyota is counting on the sedan, with a lower price and a new electronics system, to restore respect for the company.
snippet: Toyota is counting on the sedan, with a lower price and a new electronics system, to restore respect for the company.
lead_paragraph: DEARBORN, Mich. — Toyota unveiled a revamped, lower-priced Camry on Tuesday that it hopes will retain its nearly decade-long dominance as the best-selling car in the United States and help the company regain some of the respect and momentum that has evaporated in recent years.

headline.main: New Camry, Spruced Up but Still Free of Flash
headline.print_headline: New Camry, Spruced Up But Still Free of Flash
